summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeHSA/FSA eligibleHydrate your way to clearer skin with Murad's Clarifying Water Gel, formulated with quorum-sensing technology to help balance, purify, and refine.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsHyaluronic acid helps boost hydrationSalicylic acid helps exfoliate for a more balanced, non-greasy finishKorean red pine extract helps fight quorum sensing which is known to cause microbiome imbalance and irritation associated with breakoutsAlways tested on people, never on animalsFormulated WithoutParabens, sulfates, gluten and phthalatesResearch ResultsAfter 4 Weeks: 92% noticed a clearer complexionSkin (under UV light) shows a reduction in bacteria residue, a known breakout triggerProven results reported by trial participants in a 4-week clinical study.Item 2601022How To UseAM and PMCleanse with Clarifying Cleanser.Massage Clarifying Water Gel evenly over face, neck, and chest.Follow with a Murad SPF during the day.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Dimethicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Tapioca Starch, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Salicylic Acid, Urea, Yeast Amino Acids, Trehalose, Inositol, Taurine, Betaine, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Bisabolol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Lysolecithin, Sclerotium Gum, Polyisobutene, Polysilicone-11, Polydextrose, Dextrin, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Pullulan, Xanthan Gum, Amylopectin, Niacinamide, Serine, Butylene Glycol, PEG-7 Trimethylolpropane Coconut Ether, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Algin, Disodium Phosphate, Silica, Dipropylene Glycol, Pinus Densiflora Leaf Extract, Decyl Glucoside, Potassium Phosphate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzoic Acid, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: AM and PMCleanse with Clarifying Cleanser.Massage Clarifying Water Gel evenly over face, neck, and chest.Follow with a Murad SPF during the day.

reviews.headline: No ðŸ‘Ž
reviews.comments: I bought this product a while back ago And wanted to try a water gel moisturizer to see what it would do for my skin. I Felt a burning irritation while using it . It has way to much fragrance in the product. I do not recommend this to anyone!!

reviews.headline: Love love love !! Don't hesitate to buy.
reviews.comments: I have used this product for over 6 month alone with the Murad SPF , although it does leave white flakes once rubbed in together still makes my skin feel seemingly soft after . Great to wear as a makeup primer!

reviews.headline: This stuff is freakin AMAZING
reviews.comments: I haven't had a product that healed my skin so much since I was 15 and my doctor recommended a good cleanser. Both times in my life, then and now, I've been under immense stress and my skin shows it. This has been a holy grail product for me. I was so frustrated that it had 4.1 stars here I had to leave a review lol. I have oily / combo skin that is acne prone. For reference of my skin type, some other products that work on me are La Roche Possay gel cleanser, products with sulfur, CeraVe moisturizers, etc. This product has a natural ingredient that supposedly "breaks up the communication between acne that causes more acne" or whatever it says on the box, and I think that's why it is especially curing for me. It also smells so good, like medical but expensive lol. Just try it.

reviews.headline: The ONLY moisturizer that's ever worked for me
reviews.comments: I'm 56. I have acne prone, slightly oily skin. Until my 50's I always had very oily skin. No matter how much money I spent, moisturizers and sunscreens left me greasy, my skin feeling smothered and broken out. This is the first moisturizer I've ever been able to use. Its so light and refreshing, I absolutely love it. I have not had a single breakout from this. My skin drinks it in. My other products work well with this and my make up goes over smoothly. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: broke me out!!
reviews.comments: i bought the product thinking it was going to be very refreshing on my face. it however didnt seem to do that at all. So much fragrance on the product and broke me out as i continued to use it. i thought maybe it was pruging however moisturers are not likely to cause purging. just was NOT worth the price bcs it did absolutely nothing for my skin but irritate it. i have combo skin and expected so much more from this product.

reviews.headline: Must have product!
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer! I use it before applying makeup. I love that it absorbs quickly and feels great on my skin. I have noticed my skin is a lot clearer since using this product and it makes my makeup go on smoother and look better!

reviews.headline: Not good under powder
reviews.comments: I like the product and I think I notice it's been helping clear up my skin. However I can only use at night. I've used it multiple mornings and when I use this and then apply mineral powder foundation on top of it it is NOT good.

reviews.headline: Clear and moisturized skin
reviews.comments:
I am on my third bottle of this. I was trying all kinds of different products to clear up the acne I get in my hairline, eyebrows, and around my chin. I have senstive skin so trying new products is a very long (and expensive) process of trial and error. I ended up decided to cut back to just a face wash, moisterizer, and spf. My skin looked clearer than it ever had in over a decade using this. Just to be sure it was this product I subbed another moisterizer for a week and i started getting breakouts again. Went back to this and cleared it up quick. I will never be without this in my skincare routine.
I slowly added back in various products like an acid in the morning and retinol at night and I can still tolerate using this everyday with other products. I only use this water gel in the morning. As long as i let it settle for a couple minutes, I have no issues with pilling with my SPF and makeup. 
Only downside is that i much prefer the previous packaging that had the pump.

reviews.headline: Long time moisturizer for acne prone skin
reviews.comments:
I have tried countless moisturizers over the years, and I keep coming back to this one (3+ years). A family member of mine is an esthetician, so even after years of trying different high cost brand moisturizers, none work like this one. When I do try to switch, I break out due to my sensitive skin. I have super sensitive skin due to allergies, and I've struggled with acne for years.
It will most likely be the only moisturizer I will use for the rest of my life. I'm bummed they don't sell it in stores anymore, so now I have to order online. Nevertheless, after many trials and errors of different products, I will forever be the poster child for this stuff.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product forever
reviews.comments: i can't think of a better acne-prone, oily skin moisturizer. This is the BEST one, hands down. This never makes me breakout and it's super hydrating. Sometimes gel textures tend to "pill," but this one doesn't. it feels like the most luxurious moisturizer I've ever used
